# This will get executed each time the exercise gets initialized load(url("https://github.com/AaronGullickson/combined_stats/blob/master/example_datasets/politics/politics.RData?raw=true")) options(digits=3) # calculate the proportion/percent of voter choice for president in the politics dataset # calculate the proportion/percent of voter choice for president in the politics dataset prop.table(table(politics$president)) ex() %>% check_function("table", not_called_msg="Did you remember to call `table` first?") %>% check_arg(., "..1") %>% check_equal(incorrect_msg="It looks like you are not using the right variable in your `table` command") ex() %>% check_function("prop.table", not_called_msg="Did you remember to call `prop.table`?") %>% check_result() %>% check_equal() success_msg("Great Job!")
